name: Dinner Tonight: Brazilian Chicken With Orange
description: I spent all last weekend locked up in a convent (honestly—it was for a marriage prep course). The experience was rather peaceful and not nearly as painful as I had thought it might have been. But the food was awful....

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Pour the oil in a skillet, and warm over medium heat.
Cook the chicken pieces in the oil until browned on both sides. Transfer to a baking dish.
Mix all other ingredients in a bowl; pour over chicken. Place in oven, and bake for 45 minutes. Serve with rice.
